item.description: TEST ONLY; INC#TEST; 12:07PM; TEST ONLY; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1845; 11:20PM; 19223 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tDCKMf; Reseda; Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines and contained the fire to its unit of origin. It took 26 firefighters just 13 minutes to extinguish the flames. There was smoke damage to other units on the floor above. Firefighter-paramedics evaluated and treated four patients, and transported at least two of them to the hospital (unknown ages/genders/conditions). Thankfully, everyone escaped the building, as audible alarms could be heard from functional smoke detectors warning occupants of the danger. Cause under investigation.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC15 BC17 CM42 E103 E104 E273 E290 E293 E73 E87 E93 EM14 EM17 RA104 RA72 RA73 RA93 T73 T90 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1845; 11:07PM; 19223 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tDCKMf; Reseda; Two-story garden-style apartment with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E273 E293 E73 RA104 RA73 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1163; 03:30PM; 19500 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hKLfPV; Tarzana; Two-vehicle collision, involving a pedestrian. Minor injuries to one driver. Pedestrian was pulled from under vehicle prior to extrication tools being deployed, and transported to a local trauma center in serious condition. No building involvement (vehicle stopped short of hitting the structure). Nothing further. LAPD Inc 2742.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E273 E73 E83 E84 E93 EM17 HR3 RA73 RA84 RA903 T73 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1053; 02:49PM; 517 S San Julian St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pKnvzT; Downtown; Firefighters located a fire on the third floor (of the four-story hotel built in 1925), being held in check by fire sprinklers. It took 48 firefighters 16 minutes to extinguish the flames. Two patients have been located and firefighter-paramedics will assess the need for treatment and transport (unknown age/gender/condition/affiliation). Cause under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E203 E209 E210 E3 E4 E9 RA25 RA803 RA809 SQ21 T10 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1053; 02:33PM; 517 S San Julian St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pKnvzT; Downtown; Four-story pre-1933 center-hallway hotel with smoke showing. Brush Fire; INC#0734; 11:37AM; EB 118 Fwy x Rocky Peak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/36NVi10; Ventura County; LAFD responding in automatic aid to a one-quarter-acre brush fire in Ventura County (LA Co FD also responding). For more information on this incident, please monitor Ventura County FD channels. Nothing further.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E305 E73 E8 E84 E90 EM15 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA96 T105 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0238; 05:31AM; 5235 N Vantage Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HPeknR; Valley Village; Thirty-two LAFD firefighters performed a coordinated attack between interior fire attack and rooftop ventilation to extinguish the flames in 23 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E278 E289 E60 E86 RA60 RA860 T60 T78 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
